alert.note: Alert for Camden; Currituck; Pasquotank (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 3:24PM EDT until July 03 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Camden County in northeastern North Carolina... Central Pasquotank County in northeastern North Carolina... Northwestern Currituck County in northeastern North Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 324 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morgans Corner, or near South Mills, moving east to northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Elizabeth City around 330 PM EDT. Camden around 355 PM EDT. Moyock around 415 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Belcross, Burnt Mills, Snowden, Pierceville, Spences Corner, Gregory, Sligo, Lambs Corner, Johnsons Corner and Shawboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
